pr_title: [ISSUE #3687] check serviceName's format(groupName@@serviceName) in server and client

timeline.message:
1.in server, check serviceName's format 'groupName@@serviceName', groupName and serviceName can't be blank
2.in client, check 'groupName@@serviceName', groupName and serviceName can't be blank

timeline.bodyText: I think check length of array is better than catch exception.
timeline.author: KomachiSion

timeline.message: check split's length instead of exception to check argument

timeline.bodyText:
改成
serviceName = "@@"; the length = 0; illegal
serviceName = "group@@"; the length = 1; illegal
serviceName = "@@serviceName"; the length = 2; legal
serviceName = "group@@serviceName"; the length = 2; legal

会不会更好理解？
timeline.author: KomachiSion

replies.bodyText:
甚至可以吧这段放在方法的注释里，用

包一下
replies.author: KomachiSion
